channel.title: How to get this mysql function to work?
channel.description:
[code] ResultSet results = query("SELECT * FROM players WHERE playerName = '"+clientToSave.playerName+"'; <And also> playerPass = '"+clientToSave.playerPass+"';"); [/code]
Where it says <and also> i need the part of code which means, well, and also.
I tryed "AND WHERE" and "AND" but didn't work.

item.title: How to get this mysql function to work?
item.dc:creator: @Stanyer Stanyer
item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

ResultSet results = query("SELECT * FROM players WHERE playerName = '"+clientToSave.playerName+"'; <And also> playerPass = '"+clientToSave.playerPass+"';");

Where it says i need the part of code which means, well, and also.

I tryed “AND WHERE” and “AND” but didn’t work.

Read full topic
item.source: How to get this mysql function to work?
